column4: Hey!  I just  installed arch on hda and I have gutsy on hdb,  I edited the grub menu.lst file to include arch and gutsy but now when I try to boot up ubuntu it just hangs at the loading bar and puts me into the "BusyBox v1.1.3 shell"  does anyone know whats wrong?
